previous.excerpt: Derived from the concept of planet rotation and all things of cosmos, The X Planet, an exquisite car freshener, is ingeniously designed in the shape of a planet.
previous.title: X Planet - The Most Novel Car Freshener You Need

localize.description: 源自行星自转和宇宙万物的概念，X星球这款精致的汽车清新剂，巧妙地设计成行星的形状。
localize.tagline: 你需要的最新奇的汽车清新剂

localize.description: 源自行星自轉和宇宙萬物的概念，X星球這款精緻的汽車清新劑，巧妙地設計成行星的形狀。
localize.tagline: 你需要的最新奇的汽車清新劑

next.excerpt: The clean, uncomplicated lines of classic European sports coupes like the BMW 3-series and Alpha Romeo Giulia are something that's been sorely missing from EVs for at least a decade. This changes with Alpha's ACE.
next.title: The Alpha Ace EV - An ideally sized personal vehicle with an electrifying soul.

localize.description: 像宝马3系和阿尔法·罗密欧·朱利亚(Alpha Romeo Giulia)这样的欧洲经典运动跑车干净、简单的线条，是电动汽车至少十年来严重缺失的东西。这一点随着阿尔法的ACE而改变。
localize.tagline: 一辆理想大小的私人汽车，有着令人兴奋的灵魂。

localize.description: 像寶馬3系和阿爾法·羅密歐·朱利亞(Alpha Romeo Giulia)這樣的歐洲經典運動跑車乾淨、簡單的線條，是電動汽車至少十年來嚴重缺失的東西。這一點隨着阿爾法的ACE而改變。
localize.tagline: 一輛理想大小的私人汽車，有着令人興奮的靈魂。
